Description:
Location, low maintenance & Luxurious!
Beautifully designed to achieve low maintenance living and natural simplicity. This quality 2-year-old Metricon built home is perfectly suited to first home buyers, investors and growing families. This executive 'as new three-bedroom residence is positioned in the magnificent Arcadia estate in Officer, which is highly desired for its affordability and family friendly environment. Just a short distance to the Arena shopping centre where you have everything available including Woolworths, eateries, discount pharmacy and a selection of convenience stores.
Beyond the stunning modern façade, sits three superb sized bedrooms and two separate living zones, including a spectacular master suite complete with walk in robes and luxurious ensuite, the secondary bedrooms boast an ample amount of floorspace and built in robes. The deluxe bathroom and separate toilet available to accommodate the family and guests.
The inviting entry way leads you through to the open plan kitchen living and dining. The well-appointed kitchen is bound to impress, offering a practical lay out and a selection of quality appliances that include 900mm oven/ stove top, ceaser stone benchtops, dishwasher, plenty of bench and preparation space as well as the added luxury of your own walk in pantry. Internal features include ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, LED lighting and a security system.
Doors open to a beautifully manicured rear yard and a fantastic decked pergola area ready for you to host any occasion or to simply entertain family and friends. This home offers side gate access and a double remote garage with internal & external access. All situated on a 395m2 approx. allotment with little maintenance required.
If quality, elegance and class is what youre searching for in a home than this is the perfect place for you. Arrange an inspection today as this is one you wont want to miss out on.
Internal area
222.96m²

Description:
Gorgeous Home in a Fantastic Location Family!
This beautiful home set in the ever-popular Arcadia Estate. This appealing home is close to all facilities including the Cardinia Road train station, Shopping centres, Princess Hwy and Monash freeway.Featuring a family-friendly design comprising three bedrooms with a great size living area, nicely complimented by pergola area and a neat low maintenance garden. It is the ideal choice to live in or keep as a smart investment in this popular area.
Other inspired features are: -
* Master Bedroom with en-suite and a walk-in robe
* Kitchen with dishwasher, ample bench & cupboard space.
* Evaporation cooling and ducted heating
* Pergola area for outside entertaining.
* Nicely positioned facing park lands.
* Spacious light filled open plan living area.
* Walking distance to Cardinia Road Station.
* Double remote garage with internal access.
* Established low maintenance front and backyard.
*Princess Hwy and Monash Free Way access.
*Close to schools, day cares and everything you need.
Incredible Family Homes are hard to find, be quick to book your inspection or discuss this home further Call Avi on 0450727906. Photo ID required for all Inspections.

Description:
STRIKING DESIGN WITH SOPHISTICATED EDGE
Graced with an impressive facade and appointed to a standard of uncompromising quality, this superior 27 square (approx.) Fairhaven ex-display home flaunts high ceilings, a coveted northern orientation and flexible accommodation to suit any family lifestyle.
Designed for effortless family function featuring an airy open plan living area with stunning cathedral ceilings, the modern kitchen comprises quality appliances, walk in pantry and servery window which flows through to yard where landscaped gardens and artificial turf provide low maintenance ease amongst covered alfresco entertaining.
Modern matte finished tiles enhance the homes spacious interiors complemented by Caesar stone for all benchtops, carpet for all bedrooms and custom-made cabinetry throughout.
The spacious main bedroom features WIR and unique ensuite with private outdoor bath and water feature. Three secondary bedrooms all with built in robes share a sleek designer bathroom and lounge. Creature comforts include ducted heating, refrigerated cooling and a double lock up garage with internal access.
Walk to Arena Shopping Centre, Cardinia Train Station, Officer Secondary School and Bridgewood Primary School, play in the parks and benefit from the Arcadia estates prime location.
You even have the option to buy as is, complete with all designer furniture and décor.

Description:
2 Years Young and Full of Convenience!
Presenting to you an impeccably designed family home just 2 years young and ready for you to move straight in. Comprising of three spacious bedrooms and convenience with two separate living zones. The master entailing his & her walk in robe and ensuite, equipped with double vanity and oversize shower, the remaining two bedrooms boast built in robes and an ample amount of floor space which is easily accessible to the shared bathroom and separate toilet.
Located to the front of the home you have a generous sized family room ideal for a second living zone or a 4th bedroom. Moving throughout the home into the kitchen which is sure to impress the chef of the household, showcasing a 900mm oven/stovetop, generous size 80mm stone island bench overlooking the spacious open plan dining and living area. Interior extras include ducted heating, laundry, and storage through-out including spacious linen closet.
Outside you're welcomed with an open alfresco area that will allow you to entertain family and friends in style all year round. The back yard is a blank canvas to create you own master piece, whether it be a maintenance free garden or water feature that show cases the yard, the choice is yours. Additional outdoor features include double remote garage with internal and external door access, side access and and a low maintenance front garden.
Situated on a 381sqm block and perfectly located just across from parks and recreation area, short drive to Beaconsfield and moments from Arena Parade shopping centre, Lakeside shopping centre, Cardinia train station, bus's, parkland, restaurants, Cafés and a choice of great schools.
Properties like this appeal to so many buyers so get in quick to secure this home before it is too late.
Private inspections can also be arranged by appointment.
Internal area
24m²

Description:
Vacant Land in the heart of Timbertop Estate.
Titled and ready to build on. Building your dream home can be sooner than you think. If you are looking to build your dream home - this is the block for you! This block is located in the middle of Timbertop Estate at the back of the estate. This is the last vacant block in the street with very minimal fall. This block is ideal to build a dream home without many site costs.
Also Timbertop Estate is in close proximity to shopping centres, established shops, cafes, restaurants, gyms, and footy clubs. There are three train stations nearby being Officer, Cardinia Road & Beaconsfield and it is only a short drive to the Princes Highway and M1 Freeway.
Approximately 626 sqm with an 18.0 m frontage and 35.0 m of depth.
For further information please do not hesitate to contact us.

Description:
Just One look Is All You Will Need
Just one look is all you will need for this perfectly presented town home located in the heart of Officer offering a carefree & low maintenance lifestyle. Superbly presented and finished without any expense spared this state-of-the-art kitchen looks like it come straight from the pages of the home beautiful magazine. The surfaces are lined in Caesarstone and Cabinetry hand crafted by a local cabinet maker which also makes up the TV cabinet, the study area and servery to dining area. The kitchen offers double ovens, one being a combi-steam oven and the other a pyrolytic conventional oven, modern black handles and sink, integrated dishwasher and herringbone marble splashback. The master bedroom is also located on this level with a large fitted walk in robe and modern ensuite. The main living area is spacious and offers sun filled interiors, plantation shutters, glamorous sheers for the evening lights to twinkle through which sets the scene for a dinner party or a summer evening on the balcony. Downstairs is home to two bedrooms, a bathroom with separate powder room, double garage with internal access and laundry with access to a downstairs landscaped backyard. The heating and cooling is controlled by panel heaters and split system. If you are looking for a secure residence that offers premium quality, low maintenance and easy access to M1, train station, shops, cafés and public transport then look no further than Ezra Crescent.
Insights: 2 Ezra Crescent, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Dream on Dakota
A perfect blend of modern and contemporary styling, this builders own home is a stunning example of a family residence with design principles and commitment to quality, luxurious appointments and fittings throughout and a passion for entertaining.
Striking polished concrete flooring flows throughout the home naturally complimented with high quality carpet, the cutting-edge kitchen equipped with high-end stainless-steel appliances plus an integrated fridge/freezer and all overlooking the family/meals and dining area. Sliding stacker doors open to the undercover alfresco - perfect for indoor-outdoor dining and entertaining. Versatile accommodation of generous proportions, an additional separate living room which offers room for expanding families to enjoy their own pursuits.
Accommodation for all with four large bedrooms, master suite with walk through robe and ensuite, spacious three remaining rooms with built in robes serviced by the central main bathroom. Additional study nook, great sized grassed area and the concreted off-street parking space is perfect for storage in addition to the double garage with internal access.
Other comprehensive features include ducted heating, two split systems, fans throughout, spacious laundry, quality alarm, four security cameras and gas log fireplace.
This stunning creation leaves nothing to be desired.

Description:
Elite Timbertop Display Home
Built with class and sophistication in mind, this family inspired residence will leave a lasting impression from the moment you enter. With the upgrades and finishes you would expect in a display home, there is so much to be admired about this fantastic property.
Elevated ceiling upon entry immediately ensures space and comfort. Stylish, low maintenance living flows effortlessly with both indoor and outdoor spaces, open plan and formal living on offer. Stacking sliding doors open from the heart of the home to an undercover alfresco zone, allowing year-round entertaining.
Living accommodation of the family meals area surrounds the chefs kitchen being the focal point of the residence featuring elegant stone waterfall benchtops, glass splashback, double wall ovens, 900mm gas cooktop, extensive drawers and cupboard space, recessed fridge/freezer, dishwasher and microwave completed by luxury European style tapware and sinks. Additional theatre room is perfect for that separate living space to enjoy fitted with custom cabinetry and timber feature wall.
Master retreat with walk through robe complete with timber feature wall, built in cabinetry and impressive double vanity ensuite with freestanding bath. Three spacious remaining bedrooms cater for the familys needs, all serviced by the main bathroom and separate powder room. All wet areas featuring stone bench tops and both bathrooms with floor to ceiling tiles throughout.
Home is on offer with an attractive return for the savvy investor to reap the rewards of Officers premium estate. Offering a sought-after and convenient lifestyle - this on-trend home is situated moments from schools, shopping centres, popular sporting facilities, public transport and Freeway access.

Description:
SACRAMENTO BY CARLISLE HOMES
Perfectly located and with enduring elegance, this high-quality Carlisle home is only 8 months young (approx) and no expense has been spared with this luxury build. Beyond its sleek contemporary façade, you will be greeted with laminate flooring, high ceilings and wide entrance hall.
The master bedroom includes large walk in robe and full ensuite including oversized shower, double vanity and quality finishes. To the right of the home you will find bedrooms two, three and four which all include BIRs are serviced by the main bathroom which includes separate shower and bath.
The extravagant luxury kitchen forms the heart of this home and includes large island Caesarstone benchtop, large walk in pantry, plenty of cupboard space, wine storage above fridge and Westinghouse stainless steel appliances.
Your family will love the design of this outstanding home with a choice of three large separate living areas, each with stunning light fixtures installed adding to the sense of class this home oozes. The outdoor area is an entertainer delight with sliding door access from the main living area to the decked alfresco with ceiling fan installed and fully professionally landscaped backyard.
Added features include plantation shutters, walk in linen cupboard, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, large laundry with outdoor access, alarm system, remote controlled double garage, plenty of storage space and much more.
Only on inspection will you truly appreciate what this impressive home has to offer, with all the upgrades you would wish for, without the hassle of building!
Conveniently located in close proximity to local shops, Bridgewood Primary School, Officer Secondary College, Officer train station and the new proposed Officer town centre.

Description:
Location, Location, Location!
5.5 acres (approx.) located on a good sealed road minutes from Officer town centre. Yes the property has the potential to improve with all elements there including brick home, an abundance of shedding, fenced paddocks & mains water & gas.
Property features include:
*5.5 acres (approx.) of clear land including 5 fenced paddocks, dam
*4 bedrooms plus study, master with ensuite & walk in robe, other bedrooms with built in robes & serviced by the main bathroom
*Timber kitchen with dishwasher & adjoining tiled family/meals area plus large lounge with wood heater & wall air conditioner
*Huge shedding x 3 with concrete flooring & high current power plus double garage under house roofline (auto doors) plus double carport
*High ceilings, ducted heating, solar system, inground pool, gazebo with spa, paved pergola
All set back in a world of its own only minutes to top schools, Officer Central, Berwick Central, Pakenham Central & M1 freeway access.
Please call Geoff Powell on 0418 102 830 to inspect.

Description:
Dont let this one get away
A striking statement upon arrival, this near new residence just 3 years old and boasts an innovative floorplan, generous proportions and sensational low-maintenance appeal.
This beautifully presented home provides 3 generous sized bedrooms, one being the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, the secondary bedrooms are both fitted with built in robes which are all serviced by the main bathroom and separate toilet. To the rear of the home you are welcomed by a large and inviting open plan kitchen, meals & integrated living room with access to the sensational low maintenance yard with a great sized undercover pergola which overlooks the luscious grassed area, set on an (approx.) 306m2 allotment.
The impressive kitchen boasts nothing but quality, featuring stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, breakfast bar, overhead cabinetry and plenty of preparation space.
No expense has been spared to provide the best additional features which include;
- Ducted heating
- Split system cooling/heating in the main living zone
- Single remote car garage with internal & external access
- Security system installed
- Ceiling fan in the master
- Separate laundry & storage
- Single side gate access
Positioned in the desirable Arcadia Estate, this home is within close to the following amenities; Cardinia Railway Station, Lakeside Square Town Centre, Officer Town Centre and the desirable Officer Club. The position offers further appeal by being walking distance to schools, childcare and medical centre, as well as easy access to the M1 freeway.
This home will not disappoint, nor last long as it is sure to tick the boxes for investors, first homeowners and small families. Call today to schedule a private viewing or inspect at our first open for inspection.

Description:
Fantastic Young Family Home in a Prime Location!
Located in the premium sought-after Arcadia Estate, presents this spectacular three bedroom family home with modern colours with excellent inclusions that will sure to impress you!
The moment you come into the home, you will be greeted with high ceiling throughout and polished high quality timber flooring, the state-of-the-art kitchen is tailored with stainless steel appliances, glass splashback, ample bench space with 900mm gas cooktop and dishwasher. Large formal living with plenty of space to relax and enjoy the family time equipped with high performance heating & cooling system though the rest of the floorplan.
Three unbelievable welcoming size bedroom with BIRs (Master with WIR), two beautiful natural colours bathroom with ensuite to the master, loads of storage space throughout, double car garage with 2 way access to this amazing home.
Located within a 750m radius to the Officer Secondary College, Officer Club, Cardinia Road Train Station with a short drive to the Area Shopping Centre. Inspection is a must!
Contact Nik or Elvira now!

Description:
CREATE A NEW LIFESTYLE
Nestled within the prestigious Grandvue Estate in Officer, this fabulous 764m² titled block is ready for you to start building your dream home.
Treat yourself to an opportunity to create something truly special featuring generous dimensions 19m x 40m (approx.), you will have plenty of space to fit everything you desire the beautiful big home, pool, and the kids and the pets.
Enviably set amongst quality homes, youre also just a short walk from schools such as St Francis Xavier College, Arena Shopping Precinct, parks + playgrounds and a short drive to access the Monash Freeway.
Do yourself a favour and build the home you have always dreamed of, with a northerly aspect offering views to the local ranges. You wont regret it!
